instructions: Put the dinner fork on the left of the table cloth with its tine pointing upward.
put the dinner fork to the right of the table cloth with its blade pointing towards the fork
put the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with its tines pointing upward.
put the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife
put the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife with its bowl pointing upward.
put the desert spoon on the top of the table cloth with its bowl pointing leftwards
move the dessert spoon to the right of the soup spoon with its bowl pointing upward
move the dessert spoon to the top of the table cloth and rotate 90 degrees conterclockwise
place the diner plate between the dinner fork and the dinner knife
put the bread plate on top of the salad fork and to the left of the dessert spoon
put the butter knife on top of the bread plate, pointing downward and to the left
put the wine glass on top of the soup spoon
put the water glass to the left of the wine glass and to the right of the dessert spoon
put the napkin on top of the dinner plate
